title: Paranoid Android Sapphire ROM arrives on Xiaomi Mi 8 and three other phones
content:
Paranoid Android is one of the longest-running Android custom ROM projects, with official and unofficial builds for dozens of phones and tablets. The Paranoid Android team is currently working on a new update based on Android 12, called ‘Paranoid Android Saphhire,’ and now the alpha release is available on four new phones. Paranoid Android Sapphire,

The post Paranoid Android Sapphire ROM arrives on Xiaomi Mi 8 and three other phones appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Paranoid Android team now has official Android 12 ("Sapphire") builds available for more phones, including the Xiaomi Mi 8.
